name: OpenVMVault
short_description:
The Goal of OpenVMVault is to provide an enterprise class backup and restore platform for VMware vSphere using the VDDK development kit provided by VMware. 

Links to VMware documentation to get started:
http://pubs.vmware.com/vsphere-55/index.jsp#com.vmware.vddk.pg.doc/vddkIntro.3.1.html

http://pubs.vmware.com/vsphere-55/index.jsp#com.vmware.vddk.pg.doc/vddkInstall.4.2.html?path=7_4_0_1_0_0#992657

http://pubs.vmware.com/vsphere-55/index.jsp#com.vmware.vddk.pg.doc/vddkBkupVadp.9.1.html

Calling our community to help support this project and help get started. 

In the future, I would like to release Virtual Appliances as releases for easy testing and deployment.
summary: Opensource Virtual Machine backup and restore for VMware vSphere
